00031 void CnipolKinematHists::BookHists()
00032 {
00033    string shName;
00034    TH1*   hist;
00035 
00036    fDir->cd();
00037 
00038    shName = "hPseudoMass";
00039    o[shName] = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 50, 0, 20);
00040    ((TH1*) o[shName])->SetTitle("; Mass; Events;");
00041    ((TH1*) o[shName])->SetOption("E1");
00042 
00043    shName = "hMassFitChi2ByChannel";
00044    o[shName] = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), N_SILICON_CHANNELS, 0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5);
00045    ((TH1*) o[shName])->SetTitle("; Channel Id; #chi^{2};");
00046    ((TH1*) o[shName])->SetOption("hist GRIDX");
00047 
00048    shName = "hMassFitMeanByChannel";
00049    o[shName] = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), N_SILICON_CHANNELS, 0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5);
00050    ((TH1*) o[shName])->SetTitle("; Channel Id; Mean Mass;");
00051    ((TH1*) o[shName])->SetOption("E1 GRIDX");
00052 
00053    shName = "hMassFitSigmaByChannel";
00054    o[shName] = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), N_SILICON_CHANNELS, 0.5, N_SILICON_CHANNELS+0.5);
00055    ((TH1*) o[shName])->SetTitle("; Channel Id; Mass Width;");
00056    ((TH1*) o[shName])->SetOption("E1 GRIDX");
00057 
00058    DrawObjContainer        *oc;
00059    DrawObjContainerMapIter  isubdir;
00060 
00061    ChannelSetIter iCh = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.begin();
00062 
00063    for (; iCh!=gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.end(); ++iCh) {
00064 
00065       string sChId("  ");
00066       sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", *iCh);
00067 
00068       string dName = "channel" + sChId;
00069 
00070       isubdir = d.find(dName);
00071 
00072       if ( isubdir == d.end()) { // if dir not found
00073          oc = new DrawObjContainer();
00074          oc->fDir = new TDirectoryFile(dName.c_str(), dName.c_str(), "", fDir);
00075       } else {
00076          oc = isubdir->second;
00077       }
00078 
00079       oc->fDir->cd();
00080 
00081       shName = "hPseudoMass_ch" + sChId;
00082       hist = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 50, 0, 20);
00083       hist->SetTitle("; Mass; Events;");
00084       hist->SetOption("E1");
00085       oc->o[shName] = hist;
00086       fhPseudoMass_ch[*iCh-1] = hist;
00087 
00088       // If this is a new directory then we need to add it to the list
00089       if ( isubdir == d.end()) {
00090          d[dName] = oc;
00091       }
00092    }
00093 }

00097 void CnipolKinematHists::Fill(ChannelEvent *ch)
00098 {
00099    UChar_t chId  = ch->GetChannelId();
00100 
00101    //Float_t mass = ch->GetCarbonMassEstimate();
00102    Float_t mass = ch->GetCarbonMass();
00103 
00104    fhPseudoMass_ch[chId-1]->Fill(mass);
00105 }

00109 void CnipolKinematHists::FillDerived()
00110 {
00111    Info("FillDerived()", "Called");
00112 
00113    TH1* hPseudoMass = (TH1*) o["hPseudoMass"];
00114    
00115    for (UShort_t iCh=1; iCh<=N_SILICON_CHANNELS; iCh++) {
00116 
00117       string sChId("  ");
00118       sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", iCh);
00119 
00120       DrawObjContainer *oc = d.find("channel" + sChId)->second;
00121 
00122       TH1* hPseudoMass_ch = (TH1*) oc->o["hPseudoMass_ch" + sChId];
00123       hPseudoMass->Add(hPseudoMass_ch);
00124    }
00125 
00126 }

00130 void CnipolKinematHists::PostFill()
00131 {
00132    Info("PostFill", "Called");
00133 
00134    TF1 fitfunc("fitfunc", "gaus", 9, 14);
00135    //fitfunc.SetParNames("slope");
00136    //fitfunc.SetParameter(0, 0);
00137    //fitfunc.SetParameter(1, 0);
00138    //fitfunc.SetParLimits(1, -1, 1);
00139 
00140    TH1* hPseudoMass = (TH1*) o["hPseudoMass"];
00141       
00142    if (hPseudoMass->Integral() <= 0) {
00143       Error("PostFill", "Mass distribution is empty");
00144       return;
00145    }
00146 
00147    TFitResultPtr fitres = hPseudoMass->Fit(&fitfunc, "M E S R");
00148 
00149    if ( fitres.Get() && fitres->Ndf()) {
00150       gAnaMeasResult->fFitResPseudoMass = fitres;
00151    } else {
00152       Error("PostFill", "Something is wrong with mass fit");
00153       hPseudoMass->GetListOfFunctions()->Clear();
00154    }
00155 
00156    TH1* hMassFitChi2ByChannel  = (TH1*) o["hMassFitChi2ByChannel"];
00157    TH1* hMassFitMeanByChannel  = (TH1*) o["hMassFitMeanByChannel"];
00158    TH1* hMassFitSigmaByChannel = (TH1*) o["hMassFitSigmaByChannel"];
00159 
00160    // Fit channel histograms
00161    ChannelSetIter iCh = gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.begin();
00162 
00163    for (; iCh!=gMeasInfo->fSiliconChannels.end(); ++iCh) {
00164 
00165       string sChId("  ");
00166       sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", *iCh);
00167 
00168       DrawObjContainer *oc_ch = d.find("channel" + sChId)->second;
00169 
00170       TH1* hPseudoMass_ch = (TH1*) oc_ch->o["hPseudoMass_ch" + sChId];
00171       
00172       if (hPseudoMass_ch->Integral() <= 0) {
00173          Error("PostFill", "Mass distribution for channel %s is empty", sChId.c_str());
00174          continue;
00175       }
00176 
00177       TF1 fitfunc("fitfunc", "gaus", 8, 14);
00178       //fitfunc.SetParNames("slope");
00179       //fitfunc.SetParameter(0, 0);
00180       //fitfunc.SetParameter(1, 0);
00181       //fitfunc.SetParLimits(1, -1, 1);
00182 
00183       TFitResultPtr fitres = hPseudoMass_ch->Fit(&fitfunc, "M E S R");
00184 
00185       if ( fitres.Get() && fitres->Ndf()) {
00186          // check ndf
00187          //if (fitres->Ndf() <= 0) continue;
00188 
00189          hMassFitChi2ByChannel ->SetBinContent(*iCh, fitres->Chi2()/fitres->Ndf() );
00190          hMassFitMeanByChannel ->SetBinContent(*iCh, fitres->Value(1) );
00191          hMassFitMeanByChannel ->SetBinError  (*iCh, fitres->FitResult::Error(1) );
00192          hMassFitSigmaByChannel->SetBinContent(*iCh, fitres->Value(2) );
00193          hMassFitSigmaByChannel->SetBinError  (*iCh, fitres->FitResult::Error(2) );
00194       } else {
00195          Error("PostFill", "Something is wrong with mass fit for channel %s", sChId.c_str());
00196          hPseudoMass_ch->GetListOfFunctions()->Clear();
00197       }
00198    }
00199 }
